#include <iostream>

using namespace std;
#define w(t) while(t--)
#define S(x) scanf("%d",&x)
#define SLL(x) scanf("%lld",&x)
#define P(x) printf("%d",x)
#define fl(i , a, b) for(i = (int)a; i<(int)b; i++)
#define mem(a , value) memset(a , value , sizeof(a))
#define tr(c, itr) for(itr = (c).begin(); itr != (c).end(); itr++)
#define MOD 1000000007
#define MAX 1000000010
#define ll long long
#define mp make_pair
#define pb push_back
typedef pair<int,int> pp;
queue <pp> q;
std::vector<int> v[10002];
int d[1002] , vis[1002]; 
void bfs(int u)
{
	q.push(mp(u , 0 ));
	vis[1] =  1;
	d[1] =0 ; 
	while(!q.empty())
	{
		pp tmp = q.front();
		q.pop();
		int el = tmp.first ;
		int di = tmp.second; 
		for (int i = 0; i < v[el].size(); ++i)
		{
			int nx = v[el][i];
			if(!vis[nx]){
				d[nx] = di + 1;
				vis[nx] = 1;
				q.push(mp(nx , d[nx])) ; 
			}
		}
	}
	cout << d[100] << endl;
}
int main()
{
	//std::ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
	int n , m , c , k , i , j , x,  y ;
	cin >> k >> n >> m ;
	fl(i  ,1, 101)
	{
		c = k ;
		j = i+1;
		while(c> 0)
		{
			if(j > 100)
				break ; 
			else{
				c-- ; 
				v[i].pb(j);
				j++;
			}
		}
	}
	fl(i , 1, m+1)
	{
		cin >> x >> y; 
		v[x].pb(y);
	}
	fl(i,1 , n+1)
	{
		cin >> x >> y;
		v[x].pb(y);
	}
	bfs(1);
	return 0;
}
